channel.title: mbAInewsletter
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from mbAInewsletter, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The attacks on Tim Cook are half-baked—despite Apple stumbling over AI
item.description: Under Tim Cook's leadership, Apple’s market value has soared from $350 billion in 2011 to more than $3 trillion today.

item.title: Inflation accelerated in June as the Fed weighs the impact of tariffs in rate cut timing
item.description: The Bureau of Labor Statistics reported that the consumer price index (CPI), a popular inflation gauge, increased in June to 2.7% on an annual basis a...

item.title: Red state success story: Texas and Florida metros lead nation in economic and population growth
item.description: Austin, Texas, stood out as the fastest-growing metro, with eight of the 10 most booming metros being located in the South, according to a new Lending...

item.title: Coding has emerged as genAI’s killer use case. But what if its benefits are a mirage?
item.description: New research shows that coders vastly overestimated how much more efficient they were with AI help.

item.title: Inflation concerns trigger a market dip as new data shows impact of Trump tariffs in June
item.description: President Trump's trade war is beginning to impact the consumer price index.

item.title: Government Begins Prioritizing English as Official Language

item.title: 3 Perverse Ways Your Tax Dollars Fund the Left’s Dark Money Network

item.title: Judge says Trump administration can’t use travel ban to keep 80 refugees out of the US
